tasks.label: Run Current File
tasks.command: $ext=[System.IO.Path]::GetExtension('${file}'); $name=[System.IO.Path]::GetFileName('${file}'); $sep='─' * 40; if ($ext -in '.cpp','.cc','.cxx') { Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ▶  $name" -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; $err = g++ -std=c++17 -Wall -o "$env:TEMP\__run.exe" "${file}" 2>&1; if ($?) { & "$env:TEMP\__run.exe"; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✔  Exited $LASTEXITCODE" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } else { Write-Host $err -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✖  Build failed" -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } } elseif ($ext -eq '.c') { Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ▶  $name" -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; $err = gcc -o "$env:TEMP\__run.exe" "${file}" 2>&1; if ($?) { & "$env:TEMP\__run.exe"; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✔  Exited $LASTEXITCODE" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } else { Write-Host $err -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✖  Build failed" -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } } elseif ($ext -eq '.py') { Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ▶  $name" -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; python "${file}"; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✔  Done" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } elseif ($ext -eq '.js') { Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ▶  $name" -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; node "${file}"; Write-Host "`n$sep" -ForegroundColor DarkGray; Write-Host " ✔  Done" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "$sep`n" -ForegroundColor DarkGray } else { Write-Host ' ✖  File type not supported' -ForegroundColor Yellow }
